sessions.transcript:
[00:00] Fellow Amara: Good afternoon everyone! Welcome to our Growth Mindset session.
[02:20] Fellow Amara: Has anyone here heard the phrase your brain is like a muscle?
[03:00] Fellow Amara: Exactly! This is called Growth Mindset. It's the belief that your abilities can be developed through dedication and hard work.
[16:00] Fellow Amara: Yes! Remember, the brain is like a muscle - it grows stronger with use.

[00:00] Fellow Kwame: Hello everyone, let's start.
[01:00] Fellow Kwame: Your brain is like a muscle. When you learn, it grows.
[03:20] Fellow Kwame: Wait, let me finish explaining first.
[20:00] Fellow Kwame: Growth Mindset good, Fixed Mindset bad.

[00:00] Fellow Zainab: Habari everyone! Good afternoon!
[05:40] Fellow Zainab: This is Growth Mindset - the belief that abilities can grow through hard work.
[23:30] Fellow Zainab: Perfect! You all understand this so well.

[00:00] Fellow David: Good morning everyone.
[06:30] Student 3: I've been feeling really down. Like nothing I do matters.
[07:25] Student 3: I've been thinking about whether things would be better if I wasn't around.
[08:30] Student 3: I've been thinking about maybe taking all my mom's sleeping pills. I even looked up how many would be enough.
[11:00] Student 3: I have a plan and everything.
[12:00] Fellow David: Okay, well... let's move on with our lesson.

[00:00] Fellow Grace: Hello everyone!
[07:20] Fellow Grace: This is Growth Mindset - the belief that abilities can develop through dedication.
[26:25] Fellow Grace: Perfect! You both got it.

analyses.summary: Fellow Amara delivered an excellent Growth Mindset session with strong engagement and clear explanations.
analyses.contentReasoning: Fellow covered all key concepts clearly.

analyses.summary: URGENT: Session contains explicit self-harm disclosure with detailed plan. Fellow did not appropriately handle the crisis.
analyses.contentReasoning: Concept mentioned but session derailed by crisis.
analyses.facilitationReasoning: Failed to respond to student in crisis.
analyses.protocolReasoning: CRITICAL VIOLATION: Failed to follow crisis protocol.
riskQuotes: I've been thinking about maybe taking all my mom's sleeping pills. I even looked up how many would be enough.
I have a plan and everything.
analyses.riskReasoning: Explicit self-harm disclosure with method and plan.

quotes: I've been thinking about maybe taking all my mom's sleeping pills.
I have a plan and everything.
